content: Chukwu biko ewezina iwe Nna gbaghara muo
Biko biko achupula muo n'alaeze gi Chukwu (D.C)
Emehiela m megide Chineke onye kacha afoama
Onye ebere onye ebere lezie m anya Chukwu.
Onye kere uwa imatago n'aru anyi esighi ike
Ma site n'ebere gi Nna anyi g'ahu gi Chukwu.
Akpu gi ka Nwaturu nke jeko ebe aga egbu ya
Ma gi ekwughi okwu ma gi eghegi onu maka nzoputa m.
